Description: Script will look if data is decimated and automatically decimate if y.
Decimation factor. Performed iteratively by prime factors. Should be a factor of sampling rate to avoid decimal sampling rate
If y, script will assume data is whitened. Need to manually whiten data with raven and use naming conventions to path correctly.
Filter order for ALE (whitening) filter
LMS step size for ALE (whitening) filter
how many files will be combined. Used to make detector more efficient. Will affect final file size which must stay under 6 gigs.
Type of filter being used to whiten signal. Fband filters out narrowband Bband filters out broadband.
start of spread in raven detector preset folder
end of spread in raven detector preset folder
level at which rolling score will reset to maxBonus
Maximum bonus level. Same as reset value when greatcallThresh is reached.
increase factor for every call within resonable range (-maxPenalty to greatcallThresh)
same abs value as lowest value for "good calls" that give bonus
constant decrease every detection below threshold
Number of times to cross validate RF model
Desired threshold for True positive rate on model. (% of TP will return)
which machine learning model you want to classify with
Used for ORF,à,ignored for others
minimum sum of 2s and 1s to be a positive detection
maximum number of 0s (instances where run doesn't go up with next detection) until considered end of run
maximum amount of skips to be eligible increase in run
max time distance for detectors to be considered in like group
max duration of detection
min duration of detection
factor which helps determine if group will be analyzed for downsweep. If run length*downsweepCompMod is <(num detectors in group) will be considered
constant which compares upsweep size to downsweep size to see if group will be excluded. Higher value is less conservative
max secs that detections can be apart to be combined within detectors
max difference in probability difference to be combined within detectors. Otherwise will only take higher prob detection
moorings in GT dataset you want to run. Can ignore parameter if running on full mooring
Files in moorings in GT dataset you want to run. Can ignore parameter if running on full mooring. "full" if want all files from path, or file names instead of position
Vector of source folder for files
Source HG folder. "NULL" if for full dataset
vector "open" or "month" (ie open,month,open) organization option for file organization
threshold that will be excluded during image thresholding
